name: Shanea Leven
title: Founder & CEO
bio: Shanea is the co-founder and CEO of a developer platform called CodeSee.io . CodeSee shows you how your code works. CodeSee helps developers to deeply understand how your large-scale codebase works, document it, and collaborate continuously. Shanea has spent many years as a product leader building platforms for developers at Google, Docker, eBay, Cloudflare and most recently she was VP of product at Lob. She studied Computer Science and Business.
abstract:
Internal DevX Experience is brokenâ€¦ and you should be pissed

Our day to day developer experience is filled with practices that are inefficient, panic ridden and just down-right an utter slog. Let's talk about how we can create a more delightful daily experience by shifting our perspective from just in time understanding to continuous code understanding.
